CustomField.formula: IF( OR(LEFT(LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'VP', LEFT(LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'SM', LEFT(LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'Dir'), 'Sales Manager', IF( OR(LEFT(LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'SR', LEFT(LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'SC'), 'Sales Rep', IF( OR(LEFT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SalesRep__r.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'VP', LEFT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SalesRep__r.UserRole.Name, 2) = 'SM', LEFT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SalesRepRole__c, 2) = 'Dir'), 'Sales Manager', IF( OR(LEFT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SalesRepRole__c, 2) = 'SR', LEFT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SalesRepRole__c, 2) = 'SC'), 'Sales Rep', 'Sales Rep'))))
CustomField.label: Type of Approval
